reviewText: Amazing yoga. Perfect ques very relaxing snd most important your mind and body feel amazing after each flow.  Love the Sanskrit too!!!
One of the best yoga DVDs I tried! Easy to follow, gives you an awesome workout, no matter if you are new to yoga or advanced. Can not wait for the next one!

I love this yoga workout DVD. Lilly is one of my favorite yoga teachers on the North Shore of Oahu, and I was so happy when she developed this DVD, so that I could take my yoga practice with me when I moved away for school. She combines strength and grace to create a unique and meaningful practice that is challenging for both the body and heart.
